value.title: Tanzanian president promises to import coronavirus 'cure'
value.excerpt: The president of Tanzania says he will send a plane to Madagascar to import a herbal tonic which has been touted as a cure for coronavirus by the country's president. Congo-Brazzaville's president has also promised to import the drink.

value.title: UK hospital trials blood plasma treatment for COVID-19
value.excerpt: A top British hospital will use blood plasma treatment for COVID-19 patients as part of a trial that transfuses plasma from recovered people into sick people to give their immune systems a boost to fight the virus.

value.title: Coronavirus trial drug remdesivir's maker aims for wide distribution: Gilead CEO
